sentences.en: Don't saddle me with taking the children to school again.
sentences.cn: 不要再让孩子上学给我增加负担了.

sentences.en: Don't try to saddle your dirty work on me!
sentences.cn: 别想强迫我干你那讨厌的工作!

sentences.en: He ran to the door and vaulted into the saddle.
sentences.cn: 他跑到门口，飞身跃上马背。

sentences.en: He spent hours in the saddle.
He threw the old cloth saddle across the donkey's back.
sentences.cn: 他把旧布鞍搭在驴背上。

sentences.en: I had to saddle for him the first few times.
sentences.cn: 头几次我得替他套马鞍.

sentences.en: It is no surprise that she could saddle the horses.
sentences.cn: 她能给马备鞍并没有什么值得惊讶的。

sentences.en: It's good to have an experienced man in the saddle again.
sentences.cn: 又有一位经验丰富的人掌权,这太好了.

sentences.en: Katie Moore took the ladies' side-saddle award.
sentences.cn: 凯蒂·穆尔获得了最佳女侧骑手奖。

sentences.en: Naomi was given a pony and taught to ride side-saddle.
sentences.cn: 别人给娜奥米一匹小型马并教会她如何侧骑马。

sentences.en: Please give me a lift onto the saddle.
She rides easy in the saddle.
sentences.cn: 她在马鞍上骑得很轻松.

sentences.en: She swung herself into the saddle.
The bicycle saddle is too high for this child.
sentences.cn: 这辆自行车车座对这孩子来说太高了.

sentences.en: Thee bike's frame, wheels, handlebars and saddle are all made of cardboard in this way, and then fitted together.
sentences.cn: 自行车的车架、车轮、车把和车座都用以此方式制造的纸板制成，然后组装在一起。

sentences.en: We got the order to saddle up just after dawn.
sentences.cn: 我们得到命令,天一亮就要上好马鞍.

sentences.en: Why don't we saddle a couple of horses and go for a ride?
sentences.cn: 为什么我们不给几匹马配上鞍骑着转转？

trans.tran_en: a leather seat that you sit on when you ride a horse
